novel framework named Multi - Granularit.from sentence: To resolve the challenges , we propose a novel framework named Multi - Granularity Alignment Network ( MGAN ) to simultaneously align aspect granularity and aspect- specific feature representations across domains .

MGAN.from sentence: Specifically , the MGAN consists of two networks for learning aspect - specific representations for the two domains , respectively .

CFA.from sentence: The CFA considers both semantic alignment by maximally ensuring the equivalent distributions from different domains but the same class , and semantic separation by guaranteeing distributions from both different classes and domains to be as dissimilar as possible .

task discrepancy.from sentence: First , to reduce the task discrepancy between domains , i.e. , modeling the two tasks at the same fine - grained level , we propose a novel Coarse2 Fine ( C2F ) attention module to help the source task automatically capture the corresponding aspect term in the context towards the given aspect category ( e.g. , " salmon " to the " food " ) .

false alignment.from sentence: To prevent false alignment , we adopt the Contrastive Feature Alignment ( CFA ) ( Motiian et al. 2017 ) to semantically align aspect - specific representations .
